messages.message: I'm having a strange "access denied" error with chetan's ghost inspector testing account. It fails to open a refiner program located at: https://dogfood.instabase.com/apps/refiner-v3/ib_eng/tests/fs/Test%20Drive/tests/acceptance-testing/udf_imports/prog/refiner.ibprog, despite being able to view the fs tree under `ib_eng`. If I try to download that file as chetan's test account, it fails with "Cannot open a non-existent file in r mode". The file exists and has contents when opened as my instabase user account. Anyone know what might be going on?
I see it. looks like acls on this org weren’t setup for refiner access. Give me a minute.
Should be fixed now. Try again @arun?
yup, we’ve been giving the testing account permissions on a as-needed basis so not surprising. glad it’s working :slightly_smiling_face:
Oh i see. Wasn’t sure if that we intended or not, but i fixed up the ACLs to give it perms to all apps,
